title.rendered: Webinar : « How to build skills for humanitarian management and leadership »

content.rendered:
learn

Webinar : « How to build skills for humanitarian management and leadership »

01 juin 2023

Join us on Tuesday 13 June at 5:30pm !

Learn how to build skills for humanitarian management and leadership

Save the date : Tuesday 13 june from 5:30pm and 6:30pm

Sign up here 👇

This webinar is over, follow us on our networks to find out about our next events!

Humanitarian programm manager

Learn about humanitarian management

excerpt.rendered: Learn how to build skills for humanitarian management and leadership, join us on tuesday 13 june !
